TopicTitle: F-117 replica, not the best but I'm proud of it.

Articles.Content:
At the request of a fellow forum user, I have built a replica of the F-117 Nighthawk. It has only one seat, is rather small for what it's replicating and can go at considerable speed.

As I have a YouTube channel and seeing it grow makes me happy, I have decided to show it in a video rather than images.

Download: http://www./download/cp4x9ulg23eiwn9/F-117+Nighthawk.craft

I have kerbpaint but decided not to paint it and leave it as a canvas for others to use. Please post you paint jobs for this craft.

Edited June 26, 2014 by Megalodon 720
Wow! beats mine by a long shot XD
It was actually surprisingly easy, especially since the bottom is almost flat on the real thing.
